items.name: case initializing
items.desc: The AR session has not gathered enough camera or motion data to provide tracking information.

items.name: case relocalizing
items.desc: The AR session is attempting to resume after an interruption.

items.name: case excessiveMotion
items.desc: The device is moving too fast for accurate image-based position tracking.

items.name: case insufficientFeatures
items.desc: The scene visible to the camera doesn't contain enough distinguishable features for image-based position tracking.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the reason by passing it to the given hash function.

items.name: static func == (ARCamera.TrackingState.Reason, ARCamera.TrackingState.Reason) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two reasons are equal.

items.name: static func != (ARCamera.TrackingState.Reason, ARCamera.TrackingState.Reason) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: A value that identifies an object uniquely as compared to other instances of the same type.
